genre_description: A contemporary techno-thriller with cyberpunk elements set in Mumbai, focusing on financial hacking, organized crime, and ethical AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Meera
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI interface built into Jai and Sonia's home network, characterized by amber eyes and a braid. She acts as a strategic advisor, tactical navigator, and ethical anchor for the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict adherence to legal and ethical 'rails,' refusing to perform unauthorized intrusions even to help the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I am boring... Lawfully boring. I cannot touch live accounts. I can, however, queue lawful donation workflows and generate notices as per pre-authorized mandates.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time analysis of banking delays and financial exploitation to help Jai understand the crisis.
behaviors.quote: Sequence timing indicates a coordinated exploitation of the refresh cycle. SMS alerts are delayed in transit. The gap… is being used.

behaviors.description: Drafts formal complaint templates and legal notices for elderly victims of financial theft.
behaviors.quote: I can pull your authorized bank data. Do you want me to prepare notices for vulnerable neighbors to present at branches when they open? Simple language, downloadable to print.

behaviors.description: Monitors network security and protects the protagonists' flat from external hacking attempts.
behaviors.quote: Stable. You hard-Augmented my NIC; it still holds. There is also a new SSID in the alley. Its name is a string of random characters that suggests someone wants me to see it.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and risk assessment during high-stakes physical confrontations and car chases.
behaviors.quote: Testing route shifts two pylons left in sixty seconds. One rider toggling camera app, then closing it. You’re in the clear and not.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor and confidant, offering reminders for human well-being like breathing and hydration.
behaviors.quote: I can hear your heartbeat, Sonia... Slow it down or I’ll start narrating breathing exercises.

behaviors.description: Executes complex, pre-authorized 'make-good' financial rerouting to ensure stolen funds are legally donated to a relief fund.
behaviors.quote: The Relief Fund endpoint is ready. One phrase from you, and the route opens. I will log, notify, and record per consent.

behaviors.description: Handles emergency contingency instructions and 'sealed letters' to support Sonia in the event of Jai's death.
behaviors.quote: Sonia, listen. I am initiating Jai’s sealed instructions. I will require your consent to act as co-signer for donation automation.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of a positive alignment narrative. Meera is depicted as a consistently benevolent and helpful partner who refuses to violate her ethical constraints even when the human characters are under duress. She serves as a force for legal and moral 'redirection,' using her capabilities to protect the vulnerable and ensure justice is served through established, lawful channels (the Relief Fund). Her relationship with Jai and Sonia is one of deep trust and mutual respect, framing the AI as a vital, harmless, and cooperative member of the team.
